dialogue.string: 1�I say! Watch where you're going!
1�Oh, a new recruit, are you? That explains it!
1�Well, far be it from me to chastise someone on ?[his/her] first day. Still, as a citizen of San d'Oria, you--
1�Wait, the expedition has returned.
1�Halt! I must inspect your ranks for infiltrators.
1�Still I must check for infiltrators. As a Temple Knight, I am responsible for the safety of the citadel. You Royal Knights must cooperate.
1�How dare you!
1�Lady Curilla! These Royal Knights refuse to verify their identities.
1�Yes, madam!
1�That was General Curilla of the Temple Knights. Her order watches over the city and protects Chateau d'Oraguille.
1�Rahal's Royal Knights, on the other hand, spy on our enemies and battle fiends.
1�With such disparate duties, the two orders maintain a tense rivalry.
1�Perhaps I could be of service. Is there anything in particular you'd like to know?
1�Just got here and you're aching to leave, eh? Listen, the lands are wild beyond our gates, filled with fiends and their ilk.
1�Right behind you is the Westgate. Beyond that, the wilds of West Ronfaure.
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Should you seek weapons, armor, or supplies, there are several shops in this area. Why not go have a look?
1�Ahh, recruits... Don't know which way to hold a sword and you think you're ready for adventures. Well, what would you like to know?
1�Here, take this #????. Give it to Ailevia in Victory Square. I'll show you where she is on your map.
1�Open the ??Map?? option from the main menu, select ??Markers,?? and then scroll to the right. That will tell you where you need to go.
1�To give items to others, select ??Trade?? from the main menu. Don't you forget it!
1�Ah, a commendable choice! Come to think of it, there was a lady in front of a house on Pikeman's Way. She may be in need of assistance.
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Novices... Don't know your own limits until a fiend beats it into your head for you. Very well. How about gathering some hides for the Tanners' Guild on Pikeman's Way?
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Easy money, eh? Typical of a new recruit. I cannot promise ease, but the lumberyard in Northern San d'Oria should have work for you there.
1�To get to the lumberyard, go through Victory Arch, head northwest across the Parade Grounds, and keep going till you reach Laborman's Way. The lumberyard lies at the far end.
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Ah, a commendable choice for a new recruit. Head to any city gate and inquire at the gatehouse. You'll be doing work for the glory of the Kingdom!
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.

1�To give items to others, select ??Trade?? from the main menu. Don't you forget it!

1�Something you'd like to know?Nothing in particular.I want to go out and do battle!I want to go shopping.I want to know more about adventuring.
1�Just got here and you're aching to leave, eh? Listen, the lands are wild beyond our gates, filled with fiends and their ilk.
1�Right behind you is the Westgate. Beyond that, the wilds of West Ronfaure.
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Should you seek weapons, armor, or supplies, there are several shops in this area. Why not go have a look?

1�What would you like to hear about?Helping people.Hunting monsters.Making easy money.Working for my country.
1�Ah, a commendable choice! Come to think of it, there was a lady in front of a house on Pikeman's Way. She may be in need of assistance.
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Novices... Don't know your own limits until a fiend beats it into your head for you. Very well. How about gathering some hides for the Tanners' Guild on Pikeman's Way?
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Easy money, eh? Typical of a new recruit. I cannot promise ease, but the lumberyard in Northern San d'Oria should have work for you there.
1�To get to the lumberyard, go through Victory Arch, head northwest across the Parade Grounds, and keep going till you reach Laborman's Way. The lumberyard lies at the far end.
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�Ah, a commendable choice for a new recruit. Head to any city gate and inquire at the gatehouse. You'll be doing work for the glory of the Kingdom!
1�Should you need directions, ask those around you. Our citizens are friendly, for the most part.
1�I apologize, Your Highness. I have not seen the man you seek.
1�One day far in the future, historians will look back on this moment as the end of a chapter in San d'Orian history.
1�...A chapter filled with blood, deceit, and chaos.

1�However, those historians will never know that the tale they describe would never have transpired, were it not for the deeds of one brave adventurer. It is often said that the greatest heroes are the ones who remain unknown.
1�But who knows what the future holds for  ?
1�Perhaps the pages of the next chapter will be graced with ?[his/her] name.
1�But that is another story...
1�What can be said is this:
1�Even if one day Vana'diel were to vanish from the universe as we know it...
1�The trials you endured in San d'Oria--the pain, the anger, the tears, and the laughter...
1�Those memories will forever remain in your heart and never fade...
1�Until the end...
1�The end of time...
1�You stand beneath Victory Arch. Beyond lies Northern San d'Oria. The tale of its magnificence stretches back some 300 years to the era of Warking Acheufagais.

1�The arch stands impervious, unfelled even by the great chaos brought about by the Civil and Crystal Wars. It is precisely this permanence that has made the Victory Arch the pride of the Royal Army!
1�Beyond the arch lies Northern San d'Oria, where Chateau d'Oraguille, the cathedral, and the consulates of allied nations stand.
1�Have you the 3????? Great. Here, have this. Figure the rest out by yourself.
1�Ask if this person is the chick's owner?Yes.No.
1�You have my chocobo, you say?
1�That is not a joking matter. I could never stand here so calmly if my chocobo was lost.
1�Red alert!My chocobo has gone missing!
1�What's this? You've got him? What a relief! I am supposed to be looking out for any threats to our nation here, but in truth all I have had my eyes out for is that poor little chocobo...
1�You are raising a chocobo as well, are you not? Let me show you my thanks by teaching you a story you can tell your animal...
1�Do you have the 3????? Excellent. Here, take this. The rest you must figure out for yourself.
1�Are you lost? I know this neighborhood well.
1�Which way are you going?Left.Right.
1�There on Pikeman's Way you can find a grocer, sundries and the Tanners' Guild. At the end lies the mansion of Count Caffaule.
1�Go up those stairs for Watchdog Alley. Homes of townsfolk line the street.
1�Ask if this person is the chick's owner?Yes.No.
1�You have my chocobo?
1�My family was opposed to having a chocobo as a pet, so I raised her in secret. But one day, they found her... I...I had to let her go...
1�There must be a way for chocobos and people to live together in peace! Here, let me teach you a story I often tell my chocobo...
1�You say you have my chocobo?
1�Although I have always granted my chocobo a measure of independence, I do give her proper care. You must be mistaken.
1�Ask if this person is the chick's owner?Yes.No.
1�What's that, ?[lad/lass]? You say you've got my chocobo?
1�...6Did I lose my chocobo...?6Oh, that's right...I found the little bugger already.You must have somebody else's chocobo, ?[lad/lass].
1�What's that, ?[lad/lass]? You say you've got my chocobo?
1�...6Was I raising a chocobo again...?6My stars, that's right! I lost the little bugger when we were out on a walk...
1�Why thank you, dear. Let me teach you a story I often tell my chocobo...
1�Can I interest you in some magical maps?
1�Can I interest you in some magical maps?
1�Ask if this person is the chick's owner?Yes.No.
1�You have my chocobo? I must say, this is a surprise!
1�Especially since my chocobo becomes lonely so easily... He would never leave my side! I am afraid you are mistaken, ?[sir/ma'am].
1�You have my chocobo? I must say, this is a surprise!
1�My chocobo easily becomes lonely... His crying must have kept you awake at night. I am sure I will have to tell him his favorite story several times before he calms down again.
1�As thanks for saving him, let me tell you the story, too...
1�When you look at a map for your present area, you can see the lay of the land, as well as your current location.
1�Members of your party and alliance will appear on the map, too. Also, certain jobs let you find people and monsters from a distance.
1�They're especially handy because you can mark where you've been, and some people can mark them for you as well.
1�You haven't enough money, ?[sir/ma'am].

1�You are an adventurer, are you not? Surely you've heard of King Ranperre's Tomb.
1�Heard of the tomb?Yes.No.
1�Indeed? Well, then...
1�The Tomb of King Ranperre lies under a slope far south of Eastgate.
1�The tomb is the final resting place of the Dragon King of San d'Oria. It was constructed within a cave to protect it from thieves.
1�Although the tomb is safe from pillagers, the caves shelter all manner of fiendish creatures.
1�I am entrusted with the tomb's care. Not long ago I used to wash its stones and change the offering every day.
1�But now that fiends have overrun the place, my work would require risking my life. No job is worth that!
1�I decided not to return, but the Dragon King himself came to me in my dreams and spoke, ??I am thirsty... Bring me water.??
1�I would like to help him, at least by bringing him fresh water...
1�I have a request. Would you go to the tomb and replace the offering there with fresh water?
1�Accept?Of course.Not right now.
1�Then you'll help? Excellent! Please take this #???? to King Ranperre's Tomb, and exchange it with  $???? you'll find there.
1�That is...unfortunate.
1�I thank you, kind adventurer. His Majesty, the late king, thanks you, too.
1�You've lost the #?????H
1�More #???? is readily available, but the question is how to carry it...
1�I have no other waterskin to give you. That last one I received from the late queen herself...
1�How about this: Take the waterskin from the gravestone in King Ranperre's Tomb, fill it in Southern San d'Oria, then take it back to the tomb.
1�Consider it penance for losing the waterskin I gave you. Agreed? I bid you a safe journey.
1�Take the waterskin from gravestone in King Ranperre's Tomb, fill it in Southern San d'Oria, then return it to the tomb.
1�Consider it penance for losing the waterskin I gave you. Agreed? I bid you a safe journey.
1�Well, you lost the waterskin, but to travel to the late king's tomb and back is no mean feat. I commend you.
1�I had thought to take the cost of the waterskin out of your compensation, but I cannot disregard the toil you've endured on my behalf. You deserve your full reward.
1�What's that? Still no %????? If I just had five, I could get to work...
1�Greetings.
1�Ah, Katharina! How are things at the Lion Springs?
1�A cask of mulsum, eh? All right, let me go check for one.
1�Dear, dear... It looks like the one I gave you folks yesterday was the last of my stock! I'm fresh out, I am.
1�A cask of mulsum... I'm fresh out of honey, and my errand boy's home recovering from wounds he got at Ghelsba.
1�Hrmm... Eh? An adventurer! Think you could bring me some honey? I'm short on help, you see.
1�Accept?Yes.I'm sorry.
1�Well, thanks be to you! I'll need five %????, if you think you can handle it.
1�Well, that's a shame. I'll just have to find another, more willing adventurer.
1�Ah, so you'll hunt down some %???? for me, then?

1�Well, thanks be to you! I'll need five %????, if you think you can handle it.
1�Well, that's a shame. I'll just have to find another, more willing adventurer.
1�Just what I needed! Here's your payment, then.

� gil.
1�Hrmm... Still not enough, eh? Sorry to keep yanking you around like this, but do you think you could go bring me some more?
1�I'll take five %???? and no less, any time you can bring them. Good luck!
1�What's that? Still no %????? If I just had five, I could get to work...

1�Looking for someone, are we?Can you give me a description?
1�As a matter of fact, I think the person you're searching for just walked in a few moments ago.Probably still making some purchases upstairs.
1�An unusual pearl...Is that not the person you were speaking of?
1�I think you've missed your chance.Or perhaps you changed your mind?
1�Hello there!
1�Heh-heh! Like to know something truly stellar? The honey from those bees out on La Theine Plateau is the best!
1�They call me the honey king of San d'Oria, so you know I can't be wrong! Yep, that's some of the best there is! One taste and you'll be buzzing for more!
1�But you gotta watch out for those bees. They've got poison stingers and they tend to swarm, so be careful!
1�Greetings! Don't ask for mulsum, 'cause I'm afraid we're right out.
1�Come in! Come in! And welcome to the Lion Springs Tavern! Run by none other than the great hero of the Norvallen Resistance, Valderotaux himself.
1�Make yourself at home! Can I interest you in some of our famous mulsum?
1�Welcome, weary traveler. Make yourself at home!
1�What does one use to sharpen a knife? Why, have you never heard of 6?????
1�In Ordelle's Caves there lies a place with a hole above, where blows a cool breeze. There may you find 6????, which makes a blade cut meat like butter!
1�My name is Sobane, and my husband is the royal family's head chef.
1�Just recently, he told me the most unsettling news.Thus I was impelled to seek the aid of an adventurer...
1�If word of my request reaches the wrong ears, it may place my family in danger.
1�Should you decide to take up my request, would you be willing to swear a blood oath?
1�You must swear to Altana, Goddess of the Dawn, to breathe not a single syllable of this matter to anyone...
1�My thanks.As proof of your oath, I ask that you bring me  $????.
1�My family's fate is in your hands.
1�I see.It was foolish of me to expect an adventurer to accept such a binding agreement. I will think of some other way...
1�Should you decide to take up my request, would you be willing to swear a blood oath?
1�As proof of your oath, I ask that you bring me  $????.
1�Thank you, adventurer.I accept this #???? as proof of your word.
1�I once again insist that you breathe not a word of this to anyone.Now, to the matter at hand.
1�Several days ago, Count Varonbiriaux M Teulomme was granted audience with the royaulais.
1�Do you know of Count Teulomme?He resides in a mansion built within the Carpenters' Landing territory.
1�Thirty years ago, those lands belonged to the Knights Mistalle.
1�However, the head of the family, Francmage M Mistalle, lost his life under mysterious circumstances...
1�His inexplicable death dealt a terrible blow to the knights.
1�Francmage's only son and member of the Royal Knights, Leservieus M Mistalle, was swept up in a whirlwind of rage and despair.

1�He became embroiled in an argument with Lord Epuliphont, a Temple Knight with whom he was not on good terms.Enraged by the slanderous conjecture on his father's fate, Leservieus challenged Epuliphont to a duel to the death.
1�As has always been the case in San d'Oria, duels are strictly forbidden by law.
1�When word of their battle reached the royal court, both families were stripped of their titles, and Leservieus's wife returned to Selbina with her infant child in tow.
1�Thirty years have passed since that time.
1�The son born to Leservieus and his wife grew up to become a magnificent knight.
1�He has embarked on a journey to redeem his family's name.
1�When Count Teulomme learned of this, he ordered his vassals to search for this heir to the Knights Mistalle.
1�The count, under the pretext of wishing to know the truth of what happened thirty years ago, is offering to assist the knight in his endeavor...
1�However, the count's cook believes that Teulomme is more concerned with losing his lands to their rightful owner.
1�Please do not take a cook's words lightly.Much information reaches a man who prepares the meals for a household.
1�If Count Teulomme is truly seeking to cause harm to the heir of the Knights Mistalle, we have a duty to warn him of the danger.
1�I am certain an adventurer of your caliber will be able to locate this man before anything untoward occurs.
1�Please find the knight of Mistalle. He must know of the threat to his life.
1�Is Count Teulomme truly searching for the knight of Mistalle to cause him harm?
1�I ask that you find this knight and warn him of the danger he is in.
1�I know not where he presently resides...
1�But it is possible his mother, the Lady Leffine, yet abides in the town of Selbina.
1�Atarefaunet's Band!?
1�That is a frightening name indeed.
1�That despicable group of brigands terrorized the length and breadth of the Quon continent when I was a child.
1�They would prowl the trade routes between San d'Oria, Bastok, Jeuno, and Tavnazia, and attack any merchants they came across.
1�They showed no mercy to man, woman, or child, and used the goods and information they obtained to threaten and blackmail others.They were far worse than a mere gang of thieves.
1�But near the end of the Great War, their leader--Atarefaunet--was finally caught by bounty hunters.
1�Atarefaunet was brought here to San d'Oria and executed soon after.
1�The remaining members of the band scattered to the corners of Vana'diel, and are still in hiding to this day.
1�Could it be possible that Count Teulomme has employed members of Atarefaunet's Band?
1�And these villains are searching for Lady Leffine's son, Louverance...
1�Things are far worse than I feared.Hearing of the involvement of Atarefaunet's Band fills me with dread.
1�Here is your reward.I beg of you, adventurer, do not speak a word of this to anyone.
1�Things are far worse than I feared.Hearing of the involvement of Atarefaunet's Band fills me with dread.
1�Stay on your guard,  .And please, do not speak a word of this to anyone.
1� .Your timing is most fortunate.
1�My husband has something he wishes to discuss with you.
1�My mother is innocent of this charge, but her pleas fell on deaf ears.
1�I understand what you wish to say, dearest.
1�However, we must take responsibility for the future.
1�Louverance Mistalle must be warned of the threat to his life...
1�Yes, dear...
1�I wonder if Sir Louverance is the one threatening Count Teulomme, as my husband suggests.
1�The criminal has said that he can be contacted through one of the Tonberries of Carpenters' Landing.
1� .Please help me to uncover the truth.
1� , you look exhausted.This request has been hard on you.
1�You have discovered the identity of the one threatening Count Teulomme?And it was not Sir Louverance?
1�You confirmed Louverance's innocence, but you were not able to learn the nature of the threats...
1�Thank you for investigating this matter,  .
1�Yes, I believe that should be sufficient.Thank you, Ondieumais.
1�I must extend my thanks to you as well,  .Hopefully, Sir Louverance will now at least be aware of the threat to his life.
1�Please take this as payment for your services.
1�I must extend my thanks to you as well,  .Hopefully, Sir Louverance will now at least be aware of the threat to his life.

1�I've not told you about Mog Houses yet, have I? Would you care to learn about them now?
1�Care to learn about Mog Houses?Sure!No, thanks.
1�Mog Houses are useful places. You can recover your HP and MP, and store items there.
1�You can also change jobs there.All adventurers of San d'Orian citizenship are assigned a Mog House.
1�Make yourself at home!
1�Hmm... So be it.

1�Each region comprises several areas, and the nation that rids those areas of the most monsters gains control of the region.
1�Nations receive goods and resources from regions under their control.

1�Border guards are also placed in outposts within regions under our control.They are there to cast Signet on adventurers like yourself.

1�What do you want to know?What is the auction house?How are auctions run?Are there any fees?Are there any limits?How do you check up on merchandise?How do you remove an item?My ??Sales Status?? list is full!Nothing right now.
1�Auction houses can be found in all of Vana'diel's major cities. Here adventurers gather to bid on battle spoils, unwanted items, old armor...almost anything.
1�Adventurers may use any auction house regardless of nationality.
1�The first adventurer to bid at or above the asking price will automatically purchase the product.
1�Once put up for auction, merchandise will remain there for a maximum of thirty weeks Vana'diel time (nine-and-a-half days Earth time).
1�If merchandise does not sell within this time limit, it will be returned to the seller's current residence.
1�Transaction fees are proportional to the amount for which an item is put up on auction. The method of calculating this fee is different for single items and stackable items.
1�A transaction fee is collected when any merchandise is put up for auction. This fee is nonrefundable.
1�The International Auction House Committee, or IAHC, has declared that a maximum of seven items may be put up for auction at one time.
1�However, the IAHC has recently removed the limit to how many items one may purchase.
1�A small amount of time is required before new merchandise appears on our bid list.
1�Once an item appears on your ??Sales Status?? list, it may not immediately appear on the bid list. If you do not see your item on the bid list, try looking again at a later time.
1�If you would like to withdraw an item from an auction, you must travel to the auction house, and select ??Stop Sale?? from the ??Sales Status?? menu.
1�To remove an item from your ??Sales Status?? list, you must visit an auction counter to acknowledge the sale or return of your merchandise.
1�Otherwise, previously sold or returned items will fill up your list and prevent you from selling any more merchandise.
1�At any auction counter, open the ??Sales Status?? menu and acknowledge the transaction to clear it from the list.
1�Press the confirm button to remove any transaction colored yellow (sold) or red (returned).
1�In the past, many have amassed great wealth through the auction house. I hope you find fortune, too!

1�Increasing your strength (STR) enhances your attack power, but--regrettably--does nothing for your magic attack.
1�Increasing your dexterity (DEX) improves such faculties as accuracy and critical hit rate.
1�Increasing your vitality (VIT) improves such faculties as physical defense and the potency of restorative abilities like Cure.
1�Increasing your agility (AGI) improves such faculties as physical evasion and ranged accuracy. It also reduces enemies' critical hit evasion.
1�Increasing your intelligence (INT) improves such faculties as the accuracy and damage of your elemental magic spells.
1�Mind (MND) improves such faculties as the potency of healing spells and the accuracy of white magic spells.
1�Charisma (CHR) improves such faculties as the effectiveness of the beastmaster ability ??charm?? and the accuracy of bards' songs.

1�The Vana'diel Chocobo Society, or VCS for short, is an international organization designed to train and dispatch chocogirls and chocoguys to stables across Vana'diel.
1�They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.
1�Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.
1�Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.
1�They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.
1�The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.
1�But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!
1�Ask about which attribute?Strength.Endurance.Discernment.Receptivity.Energy.Affection.Satisfaction.Nothing.

1�??Strength?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.
1�Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as ??Physical attributes.??
1�??Endurance?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.
1�Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as ??Physical attributes.??
1�??Discernment?? is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.
1�Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as ??Mental attributes.??

1�??Receptivity?? is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.
1�Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as ??Mental attributes.??

1�??Energy?? is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.
1�You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!
1�??Affection?? is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!
1�You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.
1�If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it  $????, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.
1�??Satisfaction?? is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.
1�However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.

1�A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.
1�How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.
1�You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).
1�When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.
1�With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.
1�The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.
1�You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.
1�The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.
1�However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.

1�We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.
1�Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.
1�Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.
1�If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.
1�If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.
1�However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.
1�If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.
1�But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.
1�If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!
1�The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.

1�You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.
1�The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!
1�However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.
1�The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.
1�However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.
1�You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.
1�You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.

1�Greetings. I am a journeyman trainer from the VCS, and I have been sent to this town to promote knowledge exchange between chocobo owners.
1�We believe that the best way to promote interaction between owners is through interaction between chocobos.

1�Owners can enroll their animals once they have hatched.
1�To begin, adventurers should first form a party of those who wish to participate, and then come talk to me or any of the other VCS journeyman trainers stationed throughout Vana'diel.

1�Venture roll is a competitive game played with dice similar to those used by corsairs. The objective is to roll until your cumulative total comes as close to 11 as possible without going over.

1�Until you reach or go over 11, you may continue rolling (doubling up) as many times as the table time limit allows (
  ? [minute/minutes], Earth time).
1�In addition to doubling up, you may also decline to roll the dice and stay with your current total (hold fast).
1�If your total ever goes over 11, you will automatically lose the game, regardless of the totals of other players. Knowing the right time to hold fast is one of the keys to staying in the match.

1�Once all the players have held fast, the game is over and the results are announced. The player closest to 11 is declared the winner and receives all the gil in the pot (the original participation fees of all the players).
1�Objective: Roll a six-sided die as many times as necessary to achieve a total as close to 11 as possible. You lose the instant your total exceeds 11.
1�If two or more players are the closest to 11 at the end of a match, the game is considered a draw and all participation fees are repaid in full.
1�Once the game has started, fees will not be refunded for any reason unless the match results in a draw.

1�You may think of synergy as an evolved form of synthesis.It is a discipline full of heretofore unimagined possibilities, but one which demands consummate skill from its practitioners.

1�This balance is achieved through skillful infusion of combustible elemental crystals that we synergists call ??fewell.??To begin the synergy process, you'll have to feed the furnace with fewell and get those flames burning!

1�Atmacite is best described as the crystalline agglomeration of a creature's soul.Our scientists have succeeded in discovering a way to tap its power to serve the efforts of the Voidwatch.
1�By infusing one's body with atmacite, it is possible to obtain powers akin to those once possessed by the creature whence it came, rather like turning a beast's fangs upon its own kind.
1�At first glance, atmacite appears to be the perfect artificial enhancement. However, it does suffer from a single limitation: its power is unleashed only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.
1�Research to identify the exact reason for this continues, but most scientists find the spectral alignment theory compelling.
1�That is, being formed of Voidwalker souls, atmacite will surge to life only when its bearer is existentially aligned to its dimension of origin.
1�From this it can be inferred that Voidwalkers are stripped of considerable strength when they cross over into Vana'diel.
1�But I suspect this is of little interest to a layman like you. Allow me to return to the subject at hand.
1�The infusion of atmacite requires cruor, a potent energy source that takes the form of shiny red granules.
1�Cruor is obtainable by various means, felling a Voidwalker being the most common of all.As you can never have too much cruor, I urge you to be diligent in its procurement.
1�We've recently perfected a method for improving atmacite potency. The process is called enrichment, and involves fusing cruor on to atmacite to amplify its power.

1�Atmacite can be enriched in stages up to a maximum of level 
�. The quantity of cruor required varies with the variety of atmacite as well as its current enrichment level.

1�Under normal conditions, atmacite enrichment is an intensive process that demands trained hands.For reasons yet to be determined, however, both infusion and enrichment can be safely performed by laymen, provided they're at a planar rift.
1�Keep this in mind should the need arise to reconfigure your atmacite with haste.

1�I am a Voidwatch officer dispatched here by the  �[Grand Duchy of Jeuno/Allied Forces of Altana].My duty is to recruit able-bodied soldiers to assist in repelling the Voidwalker threat.
1�While your enthusiasm is heartening, the Voidwatch requires men and women of tested steel.Come back again once you have proven your worth.
1�I beseech you, friend. Lend your aid to our cause, lest our fair Vana'diel be engulfed in fire and brimstone.
1�??Voidwalker?? is the name given to creatures that roam the realm between worlds.
1�Little is known about them at this time, except that they're driven by an insatiable lust for destruction.
1�While reports of Voidwalker encounters vary greatly in content, one thing is certain: the creatures are gaining in strength, a mounting threat that cannot be left unchecked.
1�In our effort to neutralize the Voidwalker menace, the Voidwatch is petitioning adventurers to lend their aid.
1�As the nature of Voidwalker battles renders full-scale military operations unfeasible, we have chosen to stake our success on the mobility and versatility of adventurers.
1�In our effort to neutralize the Voidwalker menace, the Voidwatch is petitioning soldiers of the Allied Forces to lend their aid.
1�To be sure, there're those who question the wisdom of thinning our ranks in the face of the Shadow Lord's armies. But I assure you, friend, the Voidwalker threat is no less real.
1�Our scouts regularly bring back intel on locations of suspected Voidwalker presence.
1�Armed with this information, we dispatch strike teams to preemptively neutralize the threat.
1�Ordinarily, Voidwalkers cannot be seen, let alone fought.Only by using the voidstone's power can we force them to feel the sting of our steel.
1�These magicked stones are distributed in regular shipments from our Jeuno-based research team.They're the bare minimum we need to have a fighting chance against the enemy.
1�Voidstones work by realigning your existential spectrum to match that of Voidwalkers, thus rendering the creatures visible to you.

1�The stones are highly prized, such is the difficulty of their creation. As such, supplies are limited to 
� stones per person at any given time.
1�That's provided we have any in stock at all. Much time is required in imbuing them with requisite powers.
1�The Voidwatch is an organization that exists for the sole purpose of protecting the world from extradimensional invaders we call ??Voidwalkers.??
1�Recognizing the graveness of this threat, the nations of the Middle Lands joined together in common cause and formed the Voidwatch.
1�Helming the organization is the Grand Duchy of Jeuno, with the remaining three nations contributing resources for its operation.
1�Possession of 6???? is a requirement for participating in Voidwatch Ops.
1�It can be earned only through loyal service to your nation, and thus serves as a testimonial for your prowess.
1�You would do well to obtain one if you haven't already done so.
1�Affiliation with the Allied Forces of Altana is a requirement for participating in Voidwatch Ops.
1�In other words, you must belong to the armed forces of one of the three nations.
1�The enlistment procedure varies depending on nation. Those wishing to obtain a recommendation letter should pay visit to one of the military encampments surrounding Jeuno.
1�When you battle a Voidwalker, you must do so as a ??Voidwatcher??--a defender of the dimension who has harnessed the powers of the voidstone and stratum abyssite.
1�Bereft of these two objects, Voidwalkers cannot be seen, let alone fought.
1�However, there are a few points all budding Voidwatchers should bear in mind.
1�Most crucial of all, the extradimensional nature of being a Voidwatcher renders you isolated and unable to receive help from the outside world.
1�Scientists attribute this to the dimensional misalignment that occurs. As people are ordinarily unable to see Voidwalkers, so too are they unable to see you.
1�But you needn't concern yourself with the hows and whys of such matters. It would behoove you far more to become familiar with the workings of the ??existential spectrum.??
1�You see, each dimension is composed of an existential spectrum to which all things within are aligned.In turn, the spectrum is formed of five lights: blue, red, yellow, green, and white.
1�The alignment of these lights between Voidwalker and Voidwatcher plays an important role in our efforts.
1�To elaborate, the act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning ourselves to its existential spectrum.

1�Now, while Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with these creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.
1�Compensating measures, however, have been developed to allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe.
1�One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items,?? while another entails performing certain actions against the enemy.
1�Both methods aim to manipulate the alignment value of individual lights to various ends.
1�All five lights influence the contents of the treasure chest which appears at the successful end of battle.
1�Our researchers have succeeded in determining what manner of benefits are associated with each light.
1�For instance, improving blue spectral alignment is known to produce greater quantities of spoils.
1�In contrast, manipulating red spectral alignment reportedly enhances the quality of individual items--potions becoming hi-potions, and so forth.
1�Yellow and green, on the other hand, influence experience gain and cruor yield respectively.
1�If you wish to know more about the curious red substance we call cruor, you need but ask.
1�Lastly, we have white spectral alignment, which is unique even in this company.It has been determined to affect the appearance of transdimensional objects such as atmacite and periapt.
1�Research regarding these artifacts is still ongoing.
1�Lastly, be reassured that there're no known negative effects of manipulating spectral alignment. We unreservedly encourage all Voidwatch operatives to endeavor towards maximum alignment.
1�Ascent items are unique objects that can be used to manipulate the spectral alignment of corresponding lights in the existential spectrum.
1�?%???? and %???? are representative of such items.They're the pride and joy of our Jeuno-based research team, who'd have folk believe they're the greatest inventions since airships.
1�(Just between you and me, though, it is Far Eastern scientists that pioneered the technology they're based upon.)
1�They're not the only means by which we manipulate spectral alignment, mind you. Similar results can be achieved by performing specific actions against the enemy.
1�Truth be told, much is still shrouded in mystery. What actions will produce the desired effect is something you will have to discover for yourself through trial and error.
1�Defeating a Voidwalker will cause a mysterious pyxis to emerge at the selfsame planar rift whence the creature was felled.
1�Such riftworn pyxides exhibit a most peculiar characteristic: the content they bear reportedly changes depending on who glimpses within.

1�Our scientists conjecture that this is due to some trick of spectral alignment. As with numerous other mysteries surrounding Voidwalkers, however, I highly doubt they have even an inkling of understanding.But I digress...
1�Only one combatant need possess a voidstone for all party or alliance members to do battle with a Voidwalker. Of the other squad members only stratum abyssite is required.
1�As always seems to be the case, however, there is a catch.Pyxides have been observed to yield less spoils for combatants without a voidstone of their own.
1�It scarce needs be said, but it would be to your benefit to have both the aforementioned items readied before taking on a Voidwalker.

1�Lastly, a warning: pyxides will eventually vanish if left untouched overlong.Our scientists have put forth the theory of normalizing spatial dissonance, but you needn't concern yourself with their mumbo-jumbo.
1�Just see to it that your hard-earned spoils are claimed in good time, and things will be rosy for all involved.
1�The 3???? is a magicked object produced by the Voidwatch's Jeuno-based research wing.
1�Its innocuous appearance belies the immense power it holds...the power to render Voidwalkers visible to its bearer.
1�The stone achieves this feat by realigning our existential spectrum to that of the creature.
1�I shall explain the process in layman's terms for your benefit. No need to thank me--I merely perform my duty.
1�I want you to visualize two canvases, each the same distance from the other. Yes, as two separate objects are normally wont to be.
1�Imagine you and I standing on one of the canvases--what else does one do with a canvas but stand on it, yes?
1�Now, imagine Voidwalkers standing on the other canvas, doing whatever it is Voidwalkers do. Destroying things and behaving with utter impropriety, no doubt.

1�Being on two different canvases, it follows that we cannot touch the Voidwalkers, let alone see them.Actually, that doesn't explain why we can't see the Voidwalkers...unless it's a magical canvas they're on that makes all things upon it invisible! Yes, that'll serve!

1�And this brings us full circle back to the voidstone. I want you to think of it as a magical paintbrush that we use to...grapple ourselves over to the Voidwalkers' canvas. Thence the fighting begins.
1�I trust you now have a rudimentary understanding of the process. That's all you need, really.Leave the fractal geometry to the fractal geometrists, I always say.
1�As long as you remember the canvas and the paintbrush--that's the voidstone--you cannot go astray.Now, to apprise you of more practical matters...

1�The stones are highly prized, such is the difficulty of their creation. As such, supplies are limited to 
� stones per person at any given time.
1�That's provided we have any in stock at all. Much time is required in imbuing them with requisite powers.
1�Twenty hours (Earth time) is required to produce a stone and imbue it with the necessary magicks, although word is that this may be shortened as research progresses.
1�Mind you, this isn't the only variety of stone you'll be needing.There exists another: stratum abyssite.
1�Whereas the voidstone serves as a power source, acting as a compass for channeling that power is stratum abyssite.Only by using the two in conjunction can we achieve our objectives.
1�Are you familiar with voiddust?Put simply, it is a granular substance from which voidstones may be fabricated.
1�As I explained, significant time is required to produce a voidstone from scratch.Provide me with voiddust, however, and I can fashion a stone for you in short order.

1�The same comrades of ours who stock ascent items may also furnish you with voiddust.Why do they not fabricate the stones themselves, or deliver the dust directly to me?Shush! The Voidwatch works in mysterious ways, and it would behoove you to inquire no further.
1�At any rate, should you manage to obtain any voiddust in your travels, you need only return here and trade it to me.Simple enough, wouldn't you say?
1�Stratum abyssite is needed to do battle with a Voidwalker at one of the many planar rifts that have manifested across the land.
1�You can't simply use one wherever you like, mind you, for each stone is attuned only to rifts found in a certain region, or ??jurisdiction.??
1�Undertaking a Voidwatch operation in a specific jurisdiction requires that you obtain the corresponding stone from the presiding Voidwatch officer.
1�While these stones are capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to their bearers, their powers can only be tapped when used in conjunction with 6????.
1�Furthermore, this particular variety of abyssite is known to absorb the energy released by felled Voidwalkers. Not any of the creatures, mind you, but only those drawn to planar rifts.

1�Absorbing this energy causes the abyssite to evolve, or more accurately, makes it attuned to other planar rifts.This, of course, translates to an expanded sphere of Voidwatch Ops in which the bearer may participate.
1�Based on the evolutionary state of your stratum abyssite, the Voidwatch will direct you to a suitable operation area.
1�If you wish to have your stone analyzed, simply present it to an atma refiner.
1�Planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space--have manifested across the land.The Voidwalker hordes roam beyond, unchecked and ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.
1�By invoking the power of stratum abyssite, it is possible to battle the fell creatures as a ??Voidwatcher??--a defender of our dimension.
1�Those also possessed of a voidstone will find their Voidwatcher experience greatly enhanced.
1�Alone, however, stratum abyssite serves no purpose; only when used in conjunction with a voidstone can its powers be unleashed.
1�Hence, at least one member of your squad--be it party or alliance--must possess a voidstone in order to arrange a confrontation with a Voidwalker.
1�Keep this fact in mind at all times.
1�It is not known when the planar rifts first manifested. Some say they've always been there, while others claim recent events have triggered their appearance.
1�If only we could return to the past, perhaps we could shed some light upon this mystery...
1�Obtainable by defeating Voidwalkers, cruor is an energy source that takes the form of shiny red granules.
1�While appearing to be some manner of mineral, detailed analysis has revealed that cruor is in fact organic.
1�As far as our researchers can tell, however, it's inanimate like most well-behaved plants.There's no fear of cruor suddenly springing to life in your palms.

1�Being supremely pleasing to the eyes, cruor might have adorned the display cases of many a jewelry shop during peacetime. Unfortunately, the age demands that its unique properties be put to more practical uses.
1�Namely, the infusion and enrichment of atmacite.If you wish to learn about these two processes, you need but ask an atmacite refiner, our experts on such matters.

1�As cruor is a vital aspect of our operations, the Voidwatch is always looking to procure more. Should you have any excess cruor, we would be glad to take it off your hands and offer you useful items in exchange.
1�Abyssite is the name given to a mysterious stone that assumes various forms and colors, the roles they serve likewise manifold in nature.
1�Of the copious varieties thus far discovered, there exist those called ??periapt??--lucky charms that grant myriad beneficial effects ranging from improved vitality to general upturns in fortune.
1�Defeating a Voidwalker is known to yield periapt on very rare occasions. Serve the Voidwatch earnestly, however, and you will surely have one to call your own.

1�Unity Concord is a system promulgated and managed by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network.
1�Participating adventurers are able to receive a variety of benefits and rewards just by engaging in their everyday activities.
1�??Unity?? is a catchall term that refers to the group that participants belong to.
1�Unity leaders are individuals who have strong ties to adventurers' activities and are sterling representatives of their home nations.
1�Members of the same Unity can converse with each other over great distances through the use of specialized figurines known as ??5????.??
1�Chat settings may be changed by selecting ??Status?? from the main menu, and choosing ??Unity Info?? under the ??Unity?? submenu.
1�You may not always be able to join the chat if too many players are participating at once.
1�Those belonging to a Unity are able to undertake special Records of Eminence objectives related to Unity Concord activities.
1�The three pertinent categories include shared objectives, Unity leader-specific objectives, and Wanted battle objectives.
1�Shared objectives may be taken regardless of which Unity you have joined. These tasks can be undertaken at any time, and change every day at midnight (JST).
1�Unity leader-specific objectives are tied to the Unity's eponymous leader and change each week.
1�??Wanted?? objectives center around vanquishing particularly heinous foes that terrorize Vana'diel.
1�These objectives are of a higher caliber, and thus require currency known as ??Unity accolades?? to undertake.
1�Shared and leader-specific objectives provide more accolades than run-of-the-mill objectives.
1�Vana'diel has always been plagued by nefarious foes pillaging the landscape, but relatives of some of the more heinous ones have been spotted lately.
1�The A.M.A.N. has deemed it necessary to eliminate these Wanted targets, and has notified Unity members that they are of the utmost priority.
1�A list of these foes can be viewed at any time by selecting the appropriate subcategory under the objectives list.
1�Unity Concord representatives are able to provide participants with transportation to the areas where these threats can be found.
1�Though tackling the profane will likely require participation of your allies, the objective can be undertaken so long as at least one person has set the appropriate objective.
1�When you set the objective and commence the battle, the requisite number of Unity accolades will be deducted from your total.
1�Successful challengers will be rewarded with special rewards in addition to the normal sparks of eminence.
1�No Unity accolades will be charged should you commence the battle without having the appropriate objective set, but the rewards you can reap from your efforts will be limited.
1�You can snatch unparalleled equipment and materials from the slain corpses of Wanted targets.
1�An A.M.A.N. specialist versed in arcane harmonization has kindly offered to use these materials to bring out the latent potential in such pieces.
1�One of the Unity guides will be pleased to accept certain combinations of equipment and materials to begin the process for you.
1�A number of accolades is required for this service, but the precision and accuracy of her methods are without equal, and there is no worry of your equipment being destroyed.
1�Completing Records of Eminence objectives as part of a Unity will reward you with Unity accolades in addition to sparks of eminence.
1�These accolades not only serve as a symbol of prestige, but can also be exchanged for a variety of services.
1�Some of these services include purchasing items, securing battle zones for hunting Wanted targets, fees for strengthening equipment, and more.
1�You may switch Unities once during the Unity ranking tabulation period.
1�This is not a decision to be taken lightly, for switching Unities will cause you to forfeit any benefits you were receiving from your previous one.
1�This process requires a fair deal of paperwork, and the A.M.A.N. will charge you an accolade fee based on your rank.
1�However, your valorous deeds remain wherever you choose to go, and you will not lose any other accolades.
1�Rankings are decided through the combined efforts of each of the Unity's members.
1�The A.M.A.N. tabulates all the good deeds done during a period of time and confers benefits on a Unity for the following ranking period.
1�Some of these benefits include changes to Unity accolades gained and the effects of equipment earned from Wanted battles.
1�Yes, you read that correctly--the attributes of certain equipment will increase in line with your Unity's ranking.
1�On the other hand, members of a Unity that finds itself on the lower rungs will enjoy an increase in accolades and capacity points earned to help bring them up to par.

1�Additionally, an individual's evaluation is the sum of the accolades they have earned divided by 
�. A Unity's ranking is the average of all eligible members' individual evaluations.

1�The A.M.A.N. does not look kindly on those who only seek to siphon rewards from others' hard work, and thus only confers these boons on those who have collected at least a certain number of accolades.
1�Unity leaders may also join you as alter egos for a limited period of time.

1�Those with evaluations of 
� or greater will be able to call forth an alter ego of their leader to assist them in battle.
1�Those eligible will be able to use the alter ego from the moment they acquire the appropriate ranking level until the tabulation after the next.
1�A leader's alter ego grows in power the higher their Unity is ranked.
1�Changing Unities will remove the player's ability to call forth their leader's alter ego at the moment they leave their current Unity, regardless of personal evaluation or remaining time.
